languages.text: "М? Не считая того, что миром по-прежнему владеет скверна Архиврага, местных подданных обуяла ересь, а некогда священные машины мануфакторума превращены в орудия, направленные против Человечества — да, мой интерес исчерпан".

"Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."
languages.original_text: "М? Не считая того, что миром по-прежнему владеет скверна Архиврага, местных подданных обуяла ересь, а некогда священные машины мануфакторума превращены в орудия, направленные против Человечества — да, мой интерес исчерпан".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Oh ? À part le fait que cette planète soit toujours en proie à la corruption du Grand Ennemi, que sa population soit gangrenée par l'hérésie et que les machines autrefois sacrées de son manufactorum aient été reconverties en armes contre l'humanité, vous voulez dire ? Oui, je suis pleinement satisfait. »
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: « Oh ? À part le fait que cette planète soit toujours en proie à la corruption du Grand Ennemi, que sa population soit gangrenée par l'hérésie et que les machines autrefois sacrées de son manufactorum aient été reconverties en armes contre l'humanité, vous voulez dire ? Oui, je suis pleinement satisfait. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「まあ？惑星が依然として渾沌の勢力の腐敗に支配され、人々が異端に感染し、かつては神聖だった聖工場の機械が人類に対する武器と化しているという事実を除けば？そこそこ満足していますよ、ええ」
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ？惑星が依然として渾沌の勢力の腐敗に支配され、人々が異端に感染し、かつては神聖だった聖工場の機械が人類に対する武器と化しているという事実を除けば？そこそこ満足していますよ、ええ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “噢？你指的是，这个世界依然被混沌大敌的腐化控制，所有民众都遭到了异端的感染，制造工厂原本神圣的机器如今已经变成了对抗人类的武器，对吗？如果是这样，那我相当满足，没错。”
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: “噢？你指的是，这个世界依然被混沌大敌的腐化控制，所有民众都遭到了异端的感染，制造工厂原本神圣的机器如今已经变成了对抗人类的武器，对吗？如果是这样，那我相当满足，没错。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Oh? Abgesehen von der Tatsache, dass die Welt sich noch immer in den Klauen der Korruption des Erzfeinds befindet, ihre Bevölkerung von der Ketzerei infiziert ist und die einst heiligen Maschinen ihres Manufactorums in Waffen gegen die Menschheit verwandelt wurden? Durch und durch zufrieden, ja."
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: "Oh? Abgesehen von der Tatsache, dass die Welt sich noch immer in den Klauen der Korruption des Erzfeinds befindet, ihre Bevölkerung von der Ketzerei infiziert ist und die einst heiligen Maschinen ihres Manufactorums in Waffen gegen die Menschheit verwandelt wurden? Durch und durch zufrieden, ja."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Eh? Si dejamos aparte el hecho de que este mundo sigue presa de la corrupción del Archienemigo, su población está contaminada por la herejía y las sagradas máquinas de su manufactorum se han destinado a crear armas contra la Humanidad, sí, estoy plenamente satisfecho».
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: «¿Eh? Si dejamos aparte el hecho de que este mundo sigue presa de la corrupción del Archienemigo, su población está contaminada por la herejía y las sagradas máquinas de su manufactorum se han destinado a crear armas contra la Humanidad, sí, estoy plenamente satisfecho».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ha? Dünya hâlâ Şerbaşı'nın yozluğuyla boğuşuyor, nüfusuna kâfirlik yayılmış, manufaktorumunun vaktinde kutsal olan makineleri; insanlığa karşı kullanılan silahlara dönüştürülmüş. Tüm bunları göz ardı edersek bulduğumu söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Oh? Apart from the fact that the world is still seized by the Archenemy's corruption, its populace is infected with heresy, and the once sacred machines of its manufactorum have been turned into weapons against Humanity? Quite satisfied, yes."

traits.locale_text: "Ha? Dünya hâlâ Şerbaşı'nın yozluğuyla boğuşuyor, nüfusuna kâfirlik yayılmış, manufaktorumunun vaktinde kutsal olan makineleri; insanlığa karşı kullanılan silahlara dönüştürülmüş. Tüm bunları göz ardı edersek bulduğumu söyleyebilirim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
